Nighlight::

She fired her feather-missiles again (25 shots) agaisnt the octopus 
missiles, but a piece of razorblades that Nightlight had destroyed 
hit her in her shoulder. She felt a lot pain and walked some steps 
backwards while she tried to hold back a scream
